LanguageData.Yayo.label: yayo
LanguageData.Yayo.description: A fine white powder snorted to produce a euphoric high. Yayo reducing the user's need for rest, and suppresses pain. It is, however, addictive.
LanguageData.YayoHigh.label: high on yayo
LanguageData.YayoHigh.stages.0.label: high on yayo
LanguageData.Cocaine.label: cocaine
LanguageData.Chemical_Cocaine.label: cocaine
LanguageData.Chemical_Cocaine.description: Because of a cocaine addiction, this person needs to regularly consume the drug to avoid withdrawal symptoms.
LanguageData.CocaineTolerance.label: cocaine tolerance
LanguageData.CocaineAddiction.label: cocaine addiction
LanguageData.CocaineAddiction.stages.1.label: withdrawal
LanguageData.CocaineWithdrawal.stages.1.label: cocaine withdrawal
LanguageData.CocaineWithdrawal.stages.1.description: God I'm tired. And nothing feels good any more.
